Saw this colourful discharge coming out of the Shortlands Sewer screen on the waterworks this morning.

@EnvAgency @LDNWaterkeeper @SaveLeaMarshes https://t.co/c6yaZCa3Nl

Anyone know why builders at Mitcham Bridge are dumping waste into the River Wandle? I recorded this today at 3:15. #wandle @EnvAgencySE  @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council https://t.co/czmoLpKGHd

tweets.text:
@StinkStopthe @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @WHO @The_RHS Someone please help us üò¢
I‚Äôve just been woken up by the 4th asthma attack in the past 24 hours. I can‚Äôt breathe in my own home! I‚Äôm pregnant and I don‚Äôt need this. None of us do.

How is it acceptable for landfill fumes to affect @KeeleUniversity students study? Appalled. Why aren‚Äôt the responsible authorities putting a stop to this @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland ? @StinkStopthe https://t.co/poEAcA8QRr

@RebeccaLoo_ @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @daera_ni It depends on financial circumstances you may have to self fund but in addition to the residents action our local council announced last week they were taking their own legal action against NIEA and the operator for their inaction

@maireadc_2010 @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @daera_ni How is the legal action funded please? We can't breathe here in Newcastle-under-Lyme. Just been woken by eggy caustic air & my throat is now burning. All my windows are shut and even my window vent strips are too. Tomorrow I'm supposed to deliver quality healthcare on no sleep.

@MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency Same thing is happening here in Belfast @daera_ni  completely avoiding bringing action against operator of #Mullaghglass landfill site. Residents breathing harmful gases and have been forced to bring legal action for resolution
@EnvAgency  Urgent action required. We are prisoners in our own homes ! https://t.co/ujpAoNfzrH

V powerful video exposing what Newcastle-under-Lyme is facing-high levels of dangerous chemicals in the air polluting children‚Äôs https://t.co/Uh7pLdCD0O‚Äôs terrifying &the @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland are not protecting us.I need inhalers tonight again @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe https://t.co/Pw37yEZsRI

tweets.text: @barrow_jayne @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA Folks being gassed inside their own home where you're supposed to feel safe, how EA / RED continue to allow this to happen is beyond me, its destroying peoples mental health & well being, we can't escape the bloody stench ü§¨ reported yet again to both EA & Council. #StopTheStink

@Feargal_Sharkey @WaterUK CEO Christine McGourty dug an even bigger hole for her members by failing to justify how water cos were breaking the law by illegally dumping raw sewage, but @JamesBevanEA didn‚Äôt even turn up. @EnvAgency is a key player but loses all credibility thru their silence

@StinkStopthe @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @WHO @The_RHS Please someone help. My 2 granddaughters 2 and 4 woken up by the smell coughing and being sick today. This is a scandal and no one is listening and seem reluctant to do anything!  Why?!  Is there a fear of Red Industries?

@EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA  Do you have ANY idea how the stink from Walleys quarry is affecting our mental health never mind physical? I‚Äôm going through the menopause and to not being able to open a window in the night is torture!we need fresh air!@StinkStopthe

Smart investments in clean water and sanitation transforms lives.  https://t.co/r7Qq5Xyqts https://t.co/QOZFQ9pvHp
